text: hwla' aladhin qsst ealayk khbrhm 'ayuha alrswl, hum aladhin 'aneam allah ealayhim bfdlh wtwfyqh, fajaealahum 'anbia' min dhuriyat adm, wmin dhuriyat man hamalna mae nuh fi alsfynt, wamin dhuriyat 'ibrahym, wamin dhuriyat yeqwb, wmmman hadayna lil'iiman wastfyna llrsalt walnbuwwat, 'iidha ttla ealayhim ayat alrhmn almutadamanat ltwhydh whjjh khrru sajidin lilah khdweana, wastkant, wbkawa min khashyatih subhanah wteala
